talk0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>I really do appreciate your help, even if
I'm a little disappointed that I couldn't
help everyone grow on my own.
But sometimes the best way for students
to learn is with some practical experience.<sp:5:1:0>
Sarqso for your help!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>This is hardly the end of the lessons,
though.

Please come back and take part whenever
you like. Everyone really grew because
you stopped by!
talk0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You've traveled all over, haven't you?


Have you seen that fluffy, light ice that
floats down from the sky? I think it's
called snow?
talk0086:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>I'm sorry. I imagine that was a bit
unexpected, wasn't it?

You see, she's never seen a voe in
person. She's only seen them in drawings
or in re-creations like the voe dummies.
<snd:Think>I suspect that if you <clr:0000>hid your face<clr:ffff>, it
would be easier. It's probably just too
early to make eye contact while chatting.
I hope you aren't feeling discouraged
though. It would be wonderful if you
visited class again.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Sarqso for taking the time today.
talk0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Ooh, really? That's so nice...<sp:5:0:0> I haven't
ever seen it myself.

I hope one day I and the voe I am fated to
meet will see it together.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I'm sure sharing experiences with your
true love is a magical thing...
talk0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>I... <sp:5:1:0>Sarq!


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Do you go to canteens a lot? <sp:5:1:0>I mean,
they have wonderful drinks there, but
that isn't all, you know!
It's a great place to relax, and you get to
meet all kinds of people...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>I love going there! I have so many
fun stories...
talk0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Ah, I see. <sp:5:0:0>I haven't seen it either.


I hope one day I and the voe I am fated to
meet will see it together.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I'm sure sharing experiences with your
true love is a magical thing...
talk0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>So...<sp:5:0:0>um...hi? <sp:5:0:0>My name is Nali.


<snd:LaughL>I make an amazing wildberry crepe. And...<sp:5:0:0>
I hope to share one I've made with a voe
some day!
We'll split the crepe in half and eat
it together, I think...
talk0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>That's great, Deltan! It really looks like
you're coming into your own!

Voe can be very alert to the words we use
to describe things, and it can really help
both of you learn if you're meant to be!
Describing an experience as "magical"
captures how you feel about it. <sp:5:1:0>That
openness can be a double-edged sword...
But it's better to express yourself than
pretend to be someone you're not!
talk0089:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>That was excellent, Nali!


By mentioning sweets, you captured both
the stomach and then the heart of the voe
in one swift move!
And you kept your own needs in mind,
splitting the crepe in half and not simply
giving him the whole thing!
talk0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>As always, sarqso for coming by and
helping out.

Feel free to come around whenever you
want to. <sp:5:1:0>You're always welcome here!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You're welcome to sit in on a lesson,
if you're interested.

Voe aren't normally allowed in town, so it
would be a rare treat for the class if you
showed up.
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Maybe you could come by in the evening?
That class is for the older Gerudo.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>The daytime class is for the younger
students—I don't think they're quite
ready to meet a voe.
talk0108:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Maybe it's too early to be teaching these
young ones about the voe of the world?
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm sorry if that worried or scared you.


Voe are an uncommon sight to most of
the vai here, so hopefully you can forgive
their reactions.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Don't be discouraged though. It would
be great to have you visit us again.

And of course, sarqso for spending time
here today too...
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Sometimes I think about the students that
recently graduated from this class.

They've set out to explore the world and
possibly find the voe of their dreams, but
they aren't exactly seasoned travelers...
I hope they're OK. Last I heard, they were
near Outskirt Stable.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm sure everything is going fine.
talk0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Learning as much as you can about voe
behavior is very important.<sp:5:1:0>

Once you're out in the world looking for
that perfect voe, remember that they will
often make up reasons to talk with you.
They always want attention from vai,
after all...
talk0072:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hmm? This is...Noble Pursuit?<sp:5:0:0>
You're offering it to me?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Would you like to sit in on a lesson?
It would probably be a great learning
experience for you and for the class!
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_00>Maybe you could come by in the evening?
That class is for the older Gerudo.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>The daytime class is for the younger
students—I don't think they're quite ready
to meet a voe.
talk0073:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I think you've really helped Pritana find
her confidence!

She'll have to keep practicing, of course,
but this was a very big step for her!

Hopefully you'll visit us again!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll be starting the lesson once everyone
is here.

<sp:3:0:2:0500>But this class, the daytime class, is for
the younger students. You're going to
have to leave.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>You're welcome in the evening though!
That class is for the older vai.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Don't <sp:5:0:0>be <sp:5:0:0>nervous.


The lesson will start once everyone is
here and seated. <sp:5:1:0>It shouldn't be too much
longer, I don't think...
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, I see... <sp:5:0:0>You're that special voe the
guard was talking about.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>My name is Ashai.<sp:5:0:0> I'm in charge of
teaching the "Voe and You" class to
the Gerudo.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>I wonder if I've taught them all
I can...

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Or maybe I should be the one learning from them?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>My recent students have really been
picking up my lessons quickly. It's such
a pleasant surprise!
I don't think there's much more I can
teach them.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I wonder if it's time I set out to try to
find my true love again...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You're that special voe the guard was
talking about.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>My name is Ashai.<sp:5:0:0> I'm in charge of
teaching the "Voe and You" class to
the Gerudo.
talk0061:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Cry>I...<sp:5:1:0> I can't...


I can't look directly at his face!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>So this is when we usually have the class
for the younger students.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You might not know this, but it's
something of a rule in Gerudo Town that
young vai don't speak with voe.
Since this class is for young vai, I can't let
you come in.

You're more than welcome to come to the
class in the evening! It's just this one that
is off-limits.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>The guards will have to lock you up if you
get caught breaking our laws, and no one
wants that, right?
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. <sp:5:1:0>You again.


I told you already that this class is for the
younger students only.

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>If I catch you again, I'm going to call
the guards, and they'll lock you up
straight away.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>So... Seriously. This class is off-limits,
but you can come to the class in the
evening, OK?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>OK, listen. Sometimes people with a
special connection can learn the subtle
hints of their partner's words or actions.
They learn that "this" really means "that,"
or they can tell when their partner says
they're fine but they actually aren't.
You and I do not have that kind of
connection. When I say you cannot
come into the daytime class...
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I mean you absolutely cannot come into
the daytime class.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>It is so exhausting when someone only
hears what they want to hear...
talk0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Deltan... You're your own worst
enemy sometimes...

I've told you already that every time you
sigh, you push your own happiness away.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Heheh, you don't hold back anything,
do you?

Most vai value honesty in a voe.<sp:5:0:0> That's a
good trait for you to have.
talk0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's OK. <sp:5:1:0>We can stop here for now.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You will have to do something about that
fear eventually...

But I think once you muster the courage
to face a voe, even just one time, your
fear will wash away forever.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I wonder if it's too early to be
teaching the young ones about voe.

Then again, the more they know, the
better prepared they are for the world
around them...
talk0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hey, I can talk to him like this!


<snd:LaughS_00>So...<sp:5:0:0>um...hi? <sp:5:0:0>My name is Nali.


<snd:LaughL>I make an amazing wildberry crepe.
And...<sp:5:0:0>I hope to share one I've made with
a voe some day!
talk0006: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Guards! There's a voe breaking the law!
talk0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Amazing job, Nali!


Voe are known to think with their
stomachs sometimes, so mentioning
your cooking was a good idea.
They're especially susceptible to sweets,
so well done with the wildberry crepe!
talk0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sarqso to you as well.


It was very kind of you to conceal your
face for Nali.

It seems like that's just the thing she
needed to get past her anxiety and talk
to you.
<snd:LaughS>You are more than welcome to return to
the class in the future!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Have you set your heart on
someone special?
talk0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>I...<sp:5:0:0>I can't do it. <sp:5:0:0>I think I need <clr:0000>that drink
from the canteen<clr:ffff> to give me energy...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, is that right?


<sp:3:0:2:0100>Don't let love pass you by. Things just
kind of sparkle when you're in love,
you know...
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>This is where I teach the class on voe.
It's only for students who are willing
to engage!
If you're interested, you're welcome to
join, but you'll have to participate!
talk0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>OK, Pearle!


Can you name one behavior of a voe?
talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:CallFar_01>OK, everyone! Pay attention!


Today we're going to have a very special
lesson—we have a voe here with us!

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Just try to relax and be your regular,
normal selves when you're talking to him!

All right...
talk0055: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Nali...<sp:5:0:0> I know you can do this.
talk0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>There's no reason for me to practice.
I've been abandoned by love...<sp:5:0:0> By luck...
<sp:5:0:0>By happiness.
And you're only setting yourself up for
disaster by talking with someone like me.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I'm just fated to be unhappy.<sp:5:0:0> Steer
clear or you'll catch my misfortune.
talk0040:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Maybe she was talking about the<clr:0000> pillars over by the
entrance<clr:ffff> to the class? <sp:5:0:0>The ones with the drawings
on them?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0041:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Oh yeah, there are two...


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>But I think if you look at them from <clr:0000>over by the voe
dummies<clr:ffff>, they fit together like one stela, huh?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0120:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease_00>Could it be that they're talking about my orb?
The one I found on the sand mound near the
side of the shop?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>No... I don't know if that's the same orb she's
looking for. <sp:5:1:0>I won't say anything...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0042:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Rotana's suggestions are always actually really
annoying tasks she wants me to do.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_00>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> maybe I should not accept right away!
If I make my sister wait, maybe she'll stop
making annoying suggestions...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0043:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>Ooo, that reminds me...


Did you know that there's a secret room <clr:0000>behind the
shelf in the canteen<clr:ffff> down in the shelter?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0044:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Really? Wow! <sp:5:1:0>I wonder if whoever made the shelter
is hiding something...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Correct, Pearle!<sp:5:1:0> So you were
paying attention!

But remember, sometimes voe tell lies
because they get nervous and don't know
what to say.
<snd:LaughS>It's all right to humor them in the moment
if it happens, OK?
talk0045:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>That's underneath the jail, right? Do you think
the secret room connects to the <clr:0000>jail<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0124:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>OK! <sp:5:1:0>A voe will make up reasons to come
talk to a vai because they like getting
attention from vai.
talk0125:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>An excellent answer!<sp:5:1:0> I love it, and I have
nothing more to add.
talk0127:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Easy! If a voe invites you out on an
adventure or something, you can
act disinterested!
This will make them wonder what is
interesting to you.

And with their curiosity piqued, they'll
be more open to letting you decide what
to do!
talk0090:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>And sarqso to you as well for spending
your time with us.

Thanks to you, Nali seems to have gotten
past at least some of her anxiety.

This is a big day for her!


<snd:LaughS>Of course, it's important for all of them to
keep practicing. Please come spend some
time with us again!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>OK, class, let's get started.


Today, we're going to talk a bit about how
to tell when a voe is being genuine and
when he is not!
talk0128:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>That... <sp:5:0:0>OK,<sp:5:0:0> yes, that is correct.


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>That wasn't in my lesson. <sp:5:0:0>Where did she pick that
up from?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Think>Are you OK? <sp:5:0:0>Let's not push you too hard
today, all right?<sp:5:1:0> We'll just stop here.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's great when someone reaches outside
their comfort zone to try something new...

But no one should ever force that kind
of breakthrough.
talk0129:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Phew! I'm so relieved!


I was genuinely worried that you all
weren't paying any attention to
my lessons.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Actually, you were demonstrating another
technique—pretend to be disinterested
when you are actually really interested!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>And... I fell for it!


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>They're naturals. It's almost terrifying.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0092:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>It's all right, Nali.<sp:5:1:0> Look. The face is
well covered.
talk0110:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Yeah, that sounds right to me. <sp:5:1:0>I keep forgetting
to tell her about it...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0093:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>OK, let's go ahead and stop there.


It's wonderful when a voe and a vai can
communicate their needs to one another.

<snd:TalkPositive_00>And it's even better when they can do it
on an unspoken level!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Pritana, I think you've got a lot
of potential!
talk0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Let's talk a bit about how voe behave.


They like to suggest that vai join them in
activities, but they don't always want you
to accept right away.
Strangely, sometimes they want to feel
like they earned your company...
talk0094:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! We meet again! Could this be
coincidence or maybe something else...

Sarq for the Noble Pursuit before.
It reminded me of something...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you heard about how if a voe offers
a vai Noble Pursuit twice, they are meant
to be together?
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's only a rumor, of course!
talk0112:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Hey, that reminds me! My sister, Rotana, suggested
I investigate something she heard about!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>This is just practice!<sp:5:0:0> You don't need to
actually give it to her!

You two do seem to get along well,
though. I can see why you'd want
to continue!
talk0113:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh yeah! She said something about an orb with
a pattern carved on it, right?

You have to deal with a lot since you've got an
archaeologist for an older sister, don't you?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>A voe's behavior can tell you a lot about
the kind of person he is.

It's important to know that voe are
capable of bending the truth or even
telling outright lies.
Keep a clear head and your eyes peeled!
Someone may not be as trustworthy as
they first appear!
talk0114:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>I heard someone talking about something called a
"<clr:0000>caravan squad<clr:ffff>" in <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>, and how
someone there maybe had an orb like that?
Could that be the orb?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Remember, you absolutely can just accept
an invitation too.

<snd:Sad_00>Maybe it's too early to be teaching these
young ones about voe?
talk0098:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>It was quite clever to highlight a
connection between Noble Pursuit and
spending time together!
You might find this is easier than you
believe, Pritana!
talk0038:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Oh no! That reminds me that my sister, Rotana,
wanted me to do something for her!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>OK, there's gonna be a test on voe
behavior today.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I don't think the students are even listening
sometimes, but this test will show if I'm right
or not.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0099:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>We can stop the lesson for now, I think.


Deltan,<sp:5:0:0> I really do believe that when you
find your confidence again, things will
look a little better to you.
talk0039:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>It had to do with finding a big stone stela with text...
or writing...on it, right?

You have to deal with a lot since you've got an
archaeologist for an older sister, don't you?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0117:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! I think I saw an orb like that when I was playing
on <clr:0000>top of the kitchen in the<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>!

I dunno if that's the orb your sister heard
about though...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><sp:0:2:2:5000>Was that the thing Sumati was leaning against at
the<clr:0000> canteen in the shelter<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0119:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I think I saw an orb near the <clr:0000>waterways that run on
top of the walls<clr:ffff>.

But that was before the sand shroud showed up.
Everything is probably buried under sand now...

Aaand...that might not even be the orb you're
looking for.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>This lesson was a bit tough. Deltan is still
feeling the pain from her last relationship,
and it's really taken a toll.
I wish there was something I could show
her to help...

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01>You know, she had mentioned a certain accessory
that would help her connect with others...

But those only come from that village in Necluda,
off to the east.

That's...<sp:5:0:0>not exactly convenient.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hey!


That thing you've got there...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>Isn't that a ring garland? <sp:5:1:0>They're famous
for binding the destinies of people!
talk0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>This is the first time I've ever seen one—
I'd always just heard rumors about them.

I honestly never thought I'd see one
for real...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I mean...what are the odds that something
sold in a village far, far away to the east
would make it all the way here.
Plus, that it would be carried by this voe
of all voe—<sp:5:0:0>the only voe that can actually
enter town.
<snd:TalkPositive>And. <sp:5:1:0>Then. <sp:5:1:0>This voe would decide to visit
this class and talk to me...

...
